transcript:

Executive: Hello.

Executive: You want more and more calls instead of direct buyleads inquiry. Right. I got it. Sir, actually what happened na, all is like based on the AI process. But if you are not okay for going next level services, we will work on your services. So that's why maybe buyer is not able to reach like at your company at the same time. So might be you are getting like less call and inquiry. So this is a recommendation from our side. But if it possible, you can check visibility on online or Google or through IndiaMART directly, you can find your company listing, then you will understand why we have suggested you, sir. Customer: But yes, I'm just checking that you are using the buyleads properly. You are getting 10 leads per week, one lead per week, 17 leads. So try to consume all the leads in a week, sir.
Customer: Okay, okay, madam.
Executive: Okay. So do you do you planning for any other services, sir? Or this is a like okay for the services?
Customer: Then please try to understand, madam. I'm not getting any business, then how can I choose next level plan, madam? Please try to understand my situation.
Executive: Sir, I'll guide you because see there is so many computer available in the market. I'm not saying you will not get business in the market. Definitely, definitely.
Customer: Simple thing simple thing simple thing I am taking the again I am trusting you again you I am taking the new plan. Then after also you said then you take next plan you are suggesting next plan. Then what is the use to me taking new plan?
Executive: Sir, I'm not asking to go with the next plan. I'm asking to use the same services properly. But in the MDC based services, the number of inquiry and call flow you are getting, might be you are getting the same or might be it will increase by three or four or five times. There are five numbers. For example, if you are getting a 15 calls. So might be it will increase to 20 or 25. But I'm just checking that, sir. So if you are missing more and more calls, then the flow will decrease, sir.

Customer: Sir.
Customer: No, no, no, madam. I'm not I'm not missing any calls because of sometimes it is driving the immediately I'm calling back immediately. I'm not missing the call.

However you have you have call back to that buyer, it's okay. But it is a request if you are busy somewhere, you can just answer that call. You can ask the buyer you will call back. If you are picking a call for two or three second for just saying that I'll call you back, might be it will not showing as a miss call and you can you will got the buyer's number. You can directly call back, sir.

Executive: So so what happened na, if you are picking all the calls, the number of chances of getting more and call will increase.
Executive: Okay, sir.
Executive: I'll ask Vishal to work on your services to get a better and inquiry.

Executive: Sure, sure. I know sir.
Customer: Sunday or Monday.
Executive: Monday I'll ask him to give you a call back next Monday, then we will work or on your services. So in the meanwhile I'm just can I close your ticket, sir? Or feedback?
Customer: Okay, you can close.
Executive: Okay. Fine. Now you will get sir feedback call for
summary:
Concerns:

- Account manager suggested next plan instead of service.

- Not getting any business from current plan.

- Not receiving calls from buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained AI process for buyleads.

- Executive suggested consuming fresh buyleads.

- Executive suggested to pick up all calls.

- Vishal will call back next Monday.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, services, calls
